maker: Case by Antoine Foullet, and movement by Lapina
title: Wall Clock on Bracket
description: Wall Clock on Bracket; Case by Antoine Foullet (French, 1710 - 1775, master 1749), and movement by Lapina (French, born 1801); Paris, France; about 1764; Veneered with panels of green, red, and cream painted horn on oak carcass; gilt bronze mounts; enameled metal; 118.7 x 49.5 x 28.6 cm (46 3/4 x 19 1/2 x 11 1/4 in.); 75.DB.7; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
